frontmatter.metaTitle: All About users - UX Research in France
frontmatter.metaDescription: All About users - UX Research in France
frontmatter.title: Temporary work UX Research Study
frontmatter.subTitle: 4 days UX Research on site in France
frontmatter.clientNeedsContent: "Collecting information from UX research to design a mobile app that will be supported by its users "

steps.title: Beginning of the study
steps.body: During the kick-off, we mainly discussed about: - the needs and the actual mobile app - the main questions about the design of the app, the assumptions - The motivation to launch this study

steps.title: The sessions
steps.body:
The observations and interviews took place in an agency.
Around 7 people have been interviewed by a UX Researcher Senior.

steps.title: The analysis, Final results
steps.body:
A week after the observation, a workshop has been planned with
1. the presentation of the UX Research
2. The worker's experience map
3. First interfaces zoning
4. Prioritization of the functionalities

markdownRemark.html:
TO SUM UP

The study was about providing to workers a mobile app to improve the contact with their temporary work agency. The Research was about the worker's journey, needs and actual pain points to provide them a seamless service.


GOAL

Build a strong knowledge of :

  • user's needs
  • the relationship between the workers, the agency, the company they work for
  • Prioritization of functionalities.
